articles.description: Creators sound the alarm after the marketplace reveals its plans, which include blacklisting rivals and potentially optional royalties.
articles.content:
In brief
  • OpenSea shared its plans regarding NFT creator royalties, amid a growing trend of rival marketplaces not honoring them.
  • Notable creators suggest that OpenSeas messaging is u… [+8373 chars]
